uploads/questions/english/AL/01. Newspap.transcription: I get the news on my cell phone. There is a portal site that I use. It is one of the most well-known sites in Korea. I like to get the news on that site because it is efficient. Many articles from various news agencies are posted there. Articles have links to other articles as well. News is updated 24-7, so I can check the news whenever I want to. Getting the news has become a lot easier than in the past.

In the past, newspapers used to be printed on paper. People used to read the morning paper on their way to work. I used to do that myself. But these days, most people get the news online. I always get the news on the internet as well. Online news articles are not just written in words. They include various pictures and diagrams. Many of them include video clips as well. Readers can get a better view of what is being reported. So, these are the changes that have happened to newspapers.

I first became interested in the newspapers because of morning papers. They used to be delivered every morning. However, most newspapers have gone online now. Due to this trend, news reporting has become real-time. Things that happen are reported instantaneously. Also, there are various types of news outlets now. In the past, newspapers were run by big news corporations, but now there are tons of internet-based news outlets that are smaller. Plus, readers can now post messages on news articles. They can leave comments and exchange feedback with other readers. So, newspapers have come a long way.

There are various types of newspapers in Korea. First, there are daily papers printed by major news agencies. They deal with various types of issues. There are sections on politics, economy, society, and culture. Next, there are business newspapers. They focus more on businesses and stock markets. Plus, there are sports newspapers. They mainly focus on sports and entertainment. Once again, there are various types of newspapers in Korea.

I recently read an article about a diplomatic issue between Korea and Japan. There is an ongoing territorial dispute between the two countries. There is a small island between Korea and Japan called Dokdo. Japan argues that the island is its territory, but it is not. The island belongs to Korea. Nonetheless, Japan keeps on arguing that the island is its territory. This is a major dispute between the two countries. The article I read gave me more insight about this issue.

I remember watching the news about the recent Me Too movement. Sexual violence has become a major issue. Some people commit sexual harassment or rape. More recently, sex crime victims have been raising their voices. They're sharing their stories on the media. People are supporting the victims and criticizing the sex offenders. This is called the Me Too movement. I strongly believe that sex crimes should be wiped out completely.

uploads/questions/english/AL/02. Televis.transcription: When it comes to TV shows, I just watch whatever is good. The only types of TV shows I do not like are music programs and cooking shows. My favorite TV programs are news programs. I watch them almost every day. News programs help me keep up with current affairs. They give me more insight on various issues. They also help me learn new things. They are very helpful and informative. Once again, I like to watch news programs most often.

I watch TV in the evenings most often. I have a large TV in the living room. I like to have it on when I have dinner. Plus, I watch TV on the weekends quite often. I like to watch the reruns of popular shows. I sometimes use the VOD service to watch shows that I have missed. Also, I watch TV shows on my cell phone when I'm on the move. I can watch them whenever I want to. There are many TV show clips on YouTube. I often click on ones that I am interested in. So, this is when and where I watch TV.

TV programs have changed a lot over the years. Back in the day, they used to be old-fashioned. I think they were a bit boring. Plus, there were not that many channels. But now, TV programs have become much better in quality. They are very fun to watch and entertaining. Plus, there are so many channels now. There are a lot of options to choose from. So, TV shows have become a lot better in quality than in the past.

I first became interested in TV programs, watching cartoons when I was a kid. Back then, I enjoyed watching various types of cartoons. Many of them had action heroes. They were very fun to watch and entertaining. I was very excited whenever I watched those shows. But as I got older, I started to watch various types of TV shows, I sometimes watch TV dramas, but I sometimes watch comedy programs. I sometimes watch news programs, but I sometimes watch talk shows. So, I watch various types of TV shows now.

I remember watching the news about a food poisoning incident recently. The food went bad at some student cafeterias. That was because the weather was very hot and humid. The food was contaminated by bacteria. Many of the students were hospitalized. They got seriously sick. They had stomach pain, high fever, and vomiting. It was quite a pity that they got sick like that. So, this was the news I watched on TV recently.

uploads/questions/english/AL/03. Interne.transcription: People do tons of things on the internet these days. First, they send emails or check messages. Plus, they play online games or watch video clips. Also, they post things on social media quite often. Plus, they shop online or do online banking. So, these are the things people do on the internet.

The younger generation is very tech-savvy. They are very active and creative on the internet. Plus, they get access to the internet on their smartphones more often. They always do stuff online when they are on the move. On the other hand, the older generation is less tech-savvy. They are less active on the internet. Plus, they surf the internet on their computers more often. They do use their smartphones, but not as often as the younger generation. So, these are the differences between people in different age groups.

I do various types of things online these days. I often use my smartphone to get access to the internet. So I can surf the internet whenever I want to. First, I do online searches or read news articles. Also, I chat with people on messaging apps. Next, I stream music or watch movies. Plus, I check the weather forecast. Also, I leave comments on people's postings. So these are the things I do on the internet.

Back in the day, internet connection was quite slow. It took me a long time to log on to websites. Plus, I used to get access to the internet on my computer. But now, the internet has become a lot faster. It takes much less time to log on to websites. Also, I can surf the internet on my smartphone now. I remember talking to a friend over the phone recently about a movie. We talked about a Korean movie called Along with the Gods. It starred one of my favorite actors, Ha Zhong-u. uploads/questions/english/AL/08. Housing.transcription: I live in an apartment with my family. I have lived there for three years. There is a living room and a kitchen. Plus, there are four bedrooms, two bathrooms, and two balconies. In the living room, there are various types of furniture and home appliances. First, there is a sofa, a tea table, a cabinet, and a mirror. Also, there is a TV, an air conditioner, and an air purifier. In the kitchen, there are some electronics and various miscellaneous items. First, there is a sink, a dining table, and some cabinets. Plus, there is a fridge, a microwave, and a gas stove. Also, there is a water cooler, a rice cooker, a toaster, and a coffee machine. Plus, there are dishes, pots, pans, and utensils in the kitchen cabinets. So, this is what my place is like.

I remember studying for a test when I was a kid. However, I ate something that went bad. I got food poisoning and it was pretty bad. My stomach was upset and I felt like throwing up. I felt lightheaded because I had a fever. I had to go to the drugstore to get some medicine. I took some medicine to get better. I had to stay inside and get a lot of rest. I could not study for the test because I was sick. Since then, I try to be more careful when I eat something.

My favorite room at home is my bedroom. My room is the best place to kick back and relax. I can get some rest when I get home. In my bedroom, I have various types of things. I have a desk, a chair, a computer, and a dressing table. I also have a bookshelf, a bed, and a nightstand. I also have some dressers and some built-in closets. Plus, I can do whatever I want to in my room. I can surf the internet, listen to music, or get some I can also watch TV, read books, or watch movies. So, this is what my favorite room is like.

I do various types of housework at home. Doing housework is one of my responsibilities. I try to clean my place whenever I can. First, I vacuum and mop the floors and dust the furniture. Plus, I clean the bathroom after I take showers. Next, I do the dishes after I have meals. Also, I take out the garbage and the recycling. On weekends, I do the laundry. First, I throw my laundry in the washer. And then I wash my clothes. After that, I hang dry the laundry on the laundry rack. When they dry, I fold the clothes and put them in the dressers. So, these are my responsibilities at home.

I remember living in a house when I was a kid. There used to be a playground near my house. I used to play there all the time with my friends. I used to go on rides, such as swings or slides. I also used to play in the sand or play with a ball. I have many fond memories of that place. But now, I live in a more spacious apartment. There is a park nearby where I can take walks or ride bikes. I can get some exercise or get some fresh air there. There is a post office, a police station, and a fire station. Also, there is a bank, a bakery, a convenience store, and a dry cleaners. Plus, there is a subway station, a bus stop, a gym, and a library. Next, there are many restaurants, bars, and coffee shops. So, this is what my neighborhood is like.

I remember having my dad's birthday party at home. It was his 68th birthday. We got a birthday cake and some gifts for my dad. We cooked some food for the party. Plus, we ordered in some Chinese food. The food tasted extra good because I was starving. After the party, there were some leftovers. I helped clean up after the party. Looking back, it was a very enjoyable party.

I remember redoing the wallpaper at my apartment. The wallpaper was getting old, and it was time for a renovation. After it was done, the walls looked brand new. I was very happy with the new look. It was worth the money I spent. Plus, I remember getting some new furniture for my apartment. I got a new bed, a new table, and a new bookshelf. And then, I rearranged the furniture. So, these are the changes I remember making to my apartment.

I remember when the air conditioner broke down at home. It was during summer, and it was very hot without air conditioning. I had to call up a technician to fix the problem. Plus, I remember when the remote control for the TV did not work well. I had to replace the batteries for the remote. Also, I remember when water leaked from the fridge. I had to wipe off the water from the floor. Plus, I remember breaking a plate by mistake. So, these are the problems I remember having at home.

As I mentioned, I remember breaking a plate at home. I dropped the plate by accident because it was slippery. I lost my grip. The plate broke into several pieces. I had to clean up the glass. I picked up the big pieces and vacuumed up the small pieces. I tried to be careful, but I cut my hand on a piece of glass. It was bleeding and it was a little sore. I had to clean the cut and put a band-aid on it. Since then, I try to be more careful.

When I was a kid, my main responsibility was studying. I went to school early in the morning and came back home late at night. I also took online courses for exams. I had to study day and night. I had a lot on my plate. Sometimes I had to pull all-nighters. I especially did not have much free time in my senior year of high school. I was busy studying for the college entrance exam. Once again, my main responsibility was studying when I was a kid.

uploads/questions/english/AL/09. Housing.transcription: Homes have changed a lot over the years. For example, homes have become a lot prettier. They look very modern and well-designed. Also, homes have become much more high-tech. They are equipped with various types of new technology. They have made our lives a lot more convenient. Plus, apartments have become much taller. They are at least twice as tall as they used to be. People have a better view from their homes. So, homes have become a lot better in quality than in the past.

Frankly speaking, my parents and I do not solve problems at home that differently. First, we deal with small problems ourselves. For example, when we break a glass by mistake, we clean up the glass. We pick up the big pieces and vacuum up the small pieces. On the other hand, we get help for bigger problems. For instance, when home appliances break down, we get some help. We call up a technician to fix the problem. Once again, my parents and I do not solve problems at home that differently.

I recently watched the news about the housing market in Korea. Housing prices have skyrocketed over the years. Rent prices have also risen a lot. As a result, people have a lot of trouble finding a home to live in. People who rent a home have a hard time paying the rent. Some people get a loan to pay the rent. Some people move to smaller homes to lower the rent. Some people move to other areas to lower the rent. The government is doing what it can to curb housing prices. However, housing policies have not been that effective. So one of the biggest problems in the housing market is the rising prices of homes.

There are various types of new home appliances. They are very high-tech these days. They have made our lives a lot more convenient. One of the most important appliances is fridges. They keep food cold and prevent it from going bad. Next, microwaves heat food up. They help us cook food more easily. It takes much less time and effort to cook things. Also, air purifiers make the air clean. They are must-have items because the air quality is pretty bad these days. So, these are some new appliances people have at home.

I think vacuum cleaners are one of the most useful home appliances. They help us clean the floors more easily. Back in the day, we used to sweep the floors with brooms, but now we use vacuum cleaners to clean the floors. They suck up the dust very easily. Plus, there are wireless vacuum cleaners these days. They are even more convenient because we do not need to plug them in. So, cleaning the floors has become a lot easier thanks to vacuum cleaners.

uploads/questions/english/AL/10. Furnitu.transcription: There are various types of furniture in my apartment. In the living room, there is a sofa, a tea table, and a cabinet. In my bedroom, I have a desk, a chair, a bed, and a nightstand. I also have a bookshelf and a dressing table. I also have some dressers and some built-in closets. One of my favorite furniture is my bed. It has a very comfy and cozy mattress. It helps me to get a quality sleep. Getting a good night's sleep is very important. So, my bed is my favorite piece of furniture at home.

I have a sofa in the living room. It is a four-seater and it has several cushions on it. I sit on it when I'm watching TV or getting some rest. I sometimes lie down on it and take a nap. I always try to keep my sofa nice and clean. Plus, I have some closets in my room. I use them to store my clothes. There is a section where I hang my shirts. There is another section where I hang my winter coats and jackets. There are drawers underneath where I keep my socks and underwear. I always try to keep my closets well organized.

When I was a kid, the furniture I had was a lot smaller. For example, my bed used to be a single bed for children. The one I use now is a queen-sized bed for adults. Also, most of the furniture used to be brighter when I was a kid. For instance, my bookshelf used to be light brown. The one I use now is dark brown. So, the size and color of the furniture are the biggest differences.

I remember when one of the chairs at home got damaged. One of the legs broke off. Plus, one of the handles fell off. It was impossible to fix it, so I had to throw it away. Also, I remember when my bed got damaged. There were scratches on the side. It did not look good, so I covered it up with some sheets. So, these are some of the problems I had with my furniture.

Korea is a great example when it comes to recycling. Recycling is very well practiced all across the country. It has become a daily routine in people's lives. People gather the recyclables at home. They take them out separately. There is a designated area for the recyclables. It is usually next to the dumpster for regular garbage. Once again, recycling is very well practiced in Korea.

I gather the recyclables at home separately. I put cans, bottles, plastics, paper and glass in the recycling basket. I take them out at least once a week on average. I usually do that on my way out. Sometimes, it feels like a hassle to recycle. However, recycling is good for the environment. It is very eco-friendly. It helps us reduce the amount of garbage and reuse our resources.

When I was a kid, people did not recycle at home. There was no recycling policy. People just threw out the recyclables with the other garbage. Instead, there used to be recycling days at schools. Students used to take scrap paper to school on those days. But these days, recycling is very well practiced at people's homes. It has become a daily routine in people's lives.

I remember watching the news recently about a recycling problem in Korea. China used to import recyclables from other countries. However, they stopped doing that recently due to environmental reasons. The prices for scrap plastic plunged in Korea because there was so much supply. As a result, recycling companies stopped collecting scrap plastics. They started to pile up at people's homes. It was a very serious problem. In the end, local governments had to intervene. They started to give subsidies to companies that collected scrap plastics. So this was the incident I remember regarding recycling.

uploads/questions/english/AL/11. Work/11.transcription: I work for a large electronics company. I have worked here for nine years now. My company is a global company that does business all across the world. It is one of the market leaders in semiconductors and digital appliances. My company was founded back in the late 1960s. It was small in size when it was first created. Now, it is a huge enterprise. It has come a long way. My company's headquarters is located in Seoul, Korea. We have production lines and R&D centers in several other cities. So, these are some details about the company I work for.

I currently work in the R&D department. I have a flexible work shift. I can decide when to come to work. I usually get to work around 8 in the morning. First, I check the things I have to do that day. I normally have a to-do list on my desk. I typically do a lot of research during the day. I have a lot of paperwork to file as well. Plus, I have regular meetings with my team on Mondays. We sometimes have ad hoc meetings when there are some new issues. I normally get off work around five every day. However, there are times when I have to work late. So, these are the things I do at work.

I worked on an important project last week. There were so many things to take care of. I had a lot on my plate, and it was very hectic. First, I had to do a lot of research. Next, I had to make phone calls and send emails here and there. Plus, I had to attend back-to-back meetings. Also, I had to make briefings to my supervisor every day. I managed to finish my work at the end of the week. There were some ups and downs along the way, but everything turned out okay in the end. So, this is what I did at work last week.

uploads/questions/english/AL/12. Food/12.transcription: One of the most common foods in Korea is kimchi. Kimchi is very rich in vitamins, fiber, and minerals. It is very good for our health, and it strengthens our immune system. In fact, kimchi was selected as one of the healthiest foods in the world. I have kimchi every single day when I have meals. I actually had some yesterday during dinner. Once again, kimchi is one of the healthiest foods I have every day.

I try to eat vegetables and fruits as often as I can. They contain a lot of vitamins and fiber. They are very important for a healthy diet. Plus, I try to eat fish and chicken breasts as much as I can. They are rich in healthy protein. They help build stronger muscles. Also, I try to eat organic food whenever I can. They are not grown with chemicals, so they are much healthier. They are a bit pricey, but they are worth the money. So, these are the types of food that are healthy.

One of the best ways to cook healthy food is to use fresh ingredients. I always make sure to get fresh ingredients for cooking. I get groceries at a local supermarket near my house. The store is very large in size. There are a lot of options to choose from. They have good prices and good quality goods. So, I can get great deals there.

When I was a kid, I learned from my parents that it is important to eat healthy. My parents used to be very health-conscious. They made sure that I was getting the nutrients I needed. They made me have balanced meals. For example, they made me eat meat. But they also made me eat vegetables and fruits. They also made me drink milk and yogurt every day. Thanks to my parents, I still try to eat healthy myself. I try to cut back on unhealthy food, such as junk food. So, this is how I found out about eating healthy.

One of the biggest issues with parks is garbage problems. Some people throw away garbage at parks. They just do not know any better. Parks become very dirty because of the garbage people throw away. Littering is very irresponsible. I think people who litter at parks should be punished severely. Once again, one of the biggest issues with parks is garbage problems.

uploads/questions/english/AL/21. Shoppin.transcription: There are tons of shopping centers in Korea. They are everywhere these days. Many shopping centers are on busy streets with a lot of foot traffic. They are concentrated near subway stations or large universities. Meanwhile, shopping centers have become a lot bigger than in the past. One of the biggest places to shop is outlet malls. There are various types of stores at these places. You can get discounts so you can get great deals. Also, there are many restaurants at outlet malls. So, you can grab a bite if you are hungry. Once again, there are tons of shopping centers in Korea.

I go to various places to shop, such as outlet malls or department stores. However, I also like to shop online. Online shopping is very convenient in many ways. I do not have to go to actual stores. It takes much less time and effort to buy things. Also, there are a lot of options to choose from, so I can get great deals. Shopping has become a lot easier than in the past thanks to online shopping. Plus, I shop online on my phone now, so I can buy things whenever I want to. I get cosmetics, clothes, or tickets on the internet most often. Plus, I sometimes get food or skin products online as well. Once again, I like to shop online quite often.

I remember getting groceries with my family when I was a kid. We went to a local supermarket near our house. They had good prices and good quality goods, so we were able to get great deals there. We used to get some ice cream, milk, and cheese. Also, we used to get some chips, cookies, and sweets. Plus, we used to get some drinks and chocolates. I was very excited whenever I went there. So this was my early memory of shopping.

I remember getting groceries with my family recently. We went to a local supermarket near our house. They had good prices and good quality goods, so we were able to get great deals there. First, we got some rice and bread. We also got some fish and chicken. We also got some pork and beef. Plus, we got some beer and wine. Also, we got some salmon, tuna, and seaweed. Plus, we got some instant noodles, fruits, and veggies. So, this was the last time I went shopping for something.

I remember shopping for some running shoes recently. There were a pair of shoes I wanted to get. However, the store did not have my size in stock. They were sold out. I could not get the shoes I wanted.

One of the biggest changes in people's shopping habits is online shopping. Online shopping is very convenient in many ways. People do not have to go to actual stores. It takes much less time and effort to buy things. Also, there are a lot of options to choose from, so people can get great deals. Shopping has become a lot easier than in the past thanks to online shopping. Plus, people shop online on their phones now, so they can buy things whenever they want to. Once again, online shopping is one of the biggest changes.

People use their smartphones to listen to music these days. Most of them stream music on their phones. It is very easy to search for music on streaming sites. Meanwhile, people are very interested in Bluetooth devices these days. Smartphones have Bluetooth, so you can connect them to various types of devices. There are tons of Bluetooth earphones and Bluetooth speakers. There's no need for wires, so they are much more convenient. So, Bluetooth devices are one of the hottest devices these days.

uploads/questions/english/AL/22. Fashion.transcription: Koreans like to follow the latest fashion trends. They are very stylish and know how to dress well. For work, they dress accordingly. For play, they dress more comfortably. Plus, Korea has four distinct seasons. Spring, fall, summer, and winter. People wear different clothes for each season. So, fashion styles are seasonal. Once again, I think Koreans are very fashionable.

When it comes to fashion, I like to follow my own style. I just wear things that look good on me. I tend to wear darker colors in winter. I tend to wear brighter colors in summer. I usually like to dress casually. That is how I am dressed today, actually. However, I pay attention to detail when I dress up for special occasions.

When I was a kid, fashion styles were not that stylish. But these days, I think they are more sophisticated. People can now get exposed to new fashion trends more easily. That is because there are tons of online shopping malls. People in general have become much more fashionable than in the past. So I think fashion styles have become more sophisticated over the years.

I go to various places to shop, such as outlet malls or department stores. However, I also like to shop online. Online shopping is very convenient in many ways. I do not have to go to actual stores. It takes much less time and effort to buy things. Also, there are a lot of options to choose from, so I can get great deals. Shopping has become a lot easier than in the past thanks to online shopping. Plus, I shop online on my phone now, so I can buy things whenever I want to. I get cosmetics, clothes, or tickets on the internet most often. Plus, I sometimes get food or skin products online as well. Once again, I like to shop online quite often.

I remember shopping for some running shoes recently. There were a pair of shoes I wanted to get. However, the store did not have my size in stock. They were sold out. I could not get the shoes I wanted. Plus, I remember getting a shirt online recently. I really liked it when I got it. However, when I tried it on at home, it did not fit me that well. It did not look good on me at all. Eventually, I sent it back to get a refund.

uploads/questions/english/AL/23. Holiday.transcription: There are two big family holidays in Korea. One is New Year's Day and the other is Korean Thanksgiving. Family members get together at one place to celebrate these holidays. They ask how each other is doing and do some catching up. Cooking is a big part of family holidays. People cook holiday food and enjoy meals together. They often put on some holiday weight because they eat so much. Plus, people exchange a lot of gifts with one another. That is another big part of holiday traditions. So, these are what people do during family holidays in Korea.

I remember going to a theme park during the holidays when I was a kid. I was jumping up and down because I was so excited. There were tons of rides at the amusement park. I could not wait to go on all of them. The one I remember the most was the roller coaster. There was a long line for that, but it was worth the wait. I remember being a bit scared at first, but it was fun at the end. I also ate some burgers and pizza at the park. The food tasted extra good because I was starving. I also got some ice cream and cotton candy. So, this was what I did during the holidays when I was a kid.

I remember going to watch a movie with my family during the holidays. Before watching the movie, we got some popcorn and soft drinks at the snack bar. After watching the movie, we went to a decent Japanese restaurant. They had the best sushi in town. The food tasted extra good because I was starving. The fish we ordered was so juicy and tender. I could see why that place was so popular. We had some drinks with the meal. We ordered some beer, which went very well with the food. Looking back, it was a very enjoyable dinner.

When it comes to holidays, one of the biggest concerns is safety. People have to take precautions to be safe. For example, people have to warm up before they go into the water. If not, they could get cramps. Plus, parents must always keep an eye on their children. If not, children could get hurt or get lost. Meanwhile, another concern is food safety. People must make sure to eat safe food. If not, they could get food poisoning. Once again, safety is one of the biggest concerns when it comes to holidays.

uploads/questions/english/AL/24. Family.transcription: Let me tell you about my parents. My mom and dad are similar in some ways. First, they are very family-oriented. They like to have family gatherings. They love to see their grandchildren. Plus, they are both very active. They like to do outdoor activities. They like to go hiking, play golf, or go on trips. On the other hand, my mom and dad are different in some ways. My dad likes drinking, but my mom does not. My mom likes animals, but my dad does not. So, this is what my mom and dad are like.

I often go to bars for social gatherings. I grab some drinks with my friends. Drinks break the ice and spice up the mood. I sometimes play drinking games. I sometimes do several rounds. Plus, I sometimes go to bars for special occasions. Such occasions include birthday parties, anniversaries, or farewell parties. It is always good to have some drinks on special days like that. So, I usually go to bars to hang out with my friends.

I remember going to watch a movie with my family recently. Before watching the movie, we got some popcorn and soft drinks at the snack bar. After watching the movie, we went to a decent Japanese restaurant. They had the best sushi in town. The food tasted extra good because I was starving. The fish we ordered was so juicy and tender. I could see why that place was so popular. We had some drinks with the meal. We ordered some beer, which went very well with the food. Looking back, it was a very enjoyable dinner.

I remember having my dad's birthday party at home. It was his 68th birthday. We got a birthday cake and some gifts from my dad. We cooked some food for the party. Plus, we ordered in some Chinese food. The food tasted extra good because I was starving. After the party, there were some leftovers. I helped clean up after the party. Looking back, it was a very enjoyable party.

I always go to my parents' place during the family holidays. There are two big family holidays in Korea. One is New Year's Day, and the other is Korean Thanksgiving. Family members get together at one place to celebrate these holidays. We ask how each other is doing and do some catching up. Cooking is a big part of family holidays. We cook holiday food and enjoy meals together. We often put on some holiday weight because we eat so much. Plus, we exchange a lot of gifts with one another. That is another big part of holiday traditions. So, these are what I do during family holidays.

I remember going to my grandmother's place when I was a kid. We had dinner together. The food tasted extra good because I was starving. However, I think I ate a little too fast. I got indigestion and it was pretty bad. My stomach was upset and I felt like throwing up. I felt lightheaded because I had a fever. I had to go to the drugstore to get some medicine. I took some medicine to get better. I had to stay inside and get a lot of rest. Since then, I try to be more careful when I eat something.

I remember going to my friend's house a few years ago. We had dinner together and had some drinks. However, we ended up drinking quite a lot that day. I got very drunk because I drank too much. My stomach was upset. I felt dizzy and I could not walk straight. I got wasted and blacked out at the end. I had a hangover the next day. It took me quite a while to sober up. Since then, I try to be more careful when I drink.
I talk about tons of things with my friends. We ask how each other is doing and do some catching up. Once again, I talk about various types of things with my friends.

uploads/questions/english/AL/25. Free Ti.transcription: People often go to bars for social gatherings. They grab some drinks with their friends. Drinks break the ice and spice up the mood. They sometimes play drinking games. They sometimes do several rounds. Plus, people sometimes go to bars for staff dinners or after parties. They are a great chance to bond with coworkers. They help build chemistry with colleagues. Also, people sometimes go to bars for special occasions. Such occasions include birthday parties, anniversaries, or farewell parties. It is always good to have some drinks on special days like that. So, people often go to bars to hang out with people in their free time.

I did not have that much free time when I was a kid. I went to school early in the morning and came back home late at night. I had to study day and night. I had a lot on my plate. Sometimes, I had to pull all-nighters. I especially did not have much free time in my senior year of high school. I was busy studying for the college entrance exam. Once again, I did not have that much free time when I was a kid.

I remember going to watch a movie with my family recently. Before watching the movie, we got some popcorn and soft drinks at the snack bar. After watching the movie, we went to a decent Japanese restaurant. They had the best sushi in town. The food tasted extra good because I was starving. The fish we ordered was so juicy and tender. I could see why that place was so popular. We had some drinks with the meal. We ordered some beer, which went very well with the food. Looking back, it was a very enjoyable dinner.

uploads/questions/english/AL/26. Weather.transcription: Korea has four distinct seasons, spring, summer, fall, and winter. The weather is very nice in spring and fall. The temperatures are very mild and it is very breezy. It is great for outdoor activities because people can enjoy the fabulous weather. On the other hand, summer is sweltering hot. It is very humid and sticky. We have the rainy season in summer and it pours. Winter is the complete opposite. It is freezing cold and we get a lot of snow in winter. Once again, Korea has four distinct seasons.

It is late fall here in Korea right now. It is very sunny today and we have clear skies. The weather is getting cooler and cooler every day. Soon it will be early winter. The weather forecast says it is going to rain tomorrow.

We still have four distinct seasons in Korea. However, spring and fall have become shorter. On the other hand, summer and winter have become longer. Plus, summer is becoming hotter and hotter. We had the hottest summer in history recently. Meanwhile, winter is becoming colder and colder. It is hard to walk around when it is freezing cold. So, these are changes we are seeing in weather conditions.

I remember when a strong typhoon hit Korea last summer. There were strong winds and heavy rainfall. The torrential rain caused a lot of damage. Some rivers overflowed. There were floods all over the place. Many houses and cars went underwater. Plus, there were mudslides in some areas. Many structures fell down or were destroyed. It was very nerve-wracking. Unfortunately, there were some casualties. It took a long time to recover from the damage.

uploads/questions/english/AL/27. Transpo.transcription: People get around in various ways in Korea. Public transportation is very well organized. People take the bus or take the subway on a regular basis. They also take trains or take planes when they travel. Plus, many people drive their own cars. However, traffic gets very bad quite often. Parking can be a problem as well. So people use public transportation or drive their own cars to get around.

I personally take the subway most often. It is very convenient because I can go wherever I want to. It is one of the cheapest ways to get around. Plus, I sometimes drive my own car. I got my driver's license in 2002. So, I mostly use public transportation to get around.

When I was a kid, trains used to be slower. But now, Korea has bullet trains called the KTX and SRT. Trains have become much faster than in the past. They're at least twice as fast as they used to be. It takes half the time to get somewhere now. Plus, when I was a kid, plane tickets used to be very expensive. But now, plane tickets have become much cheaper thanks to low-cost carriers. People can get great deals for plane tickets. Some flights only cost half the price. Next, when I was a kid, people used to use paper maps when they drove. But these days, driving has become much easier because we now have GPS. People do not get lost as often as they used to. The GPS tells them where to go. So transportation has become a lot better over the years.

I remember when I was stuck in traffic for a long time. It was during the holidays, and traffic was bumper to bumper. I was heading to my grandparents' place. It took me much longer than usual. It took almost three hours to get to my destination. I felt exhausted because I was in the car for so long. Since then, I always head out early during the holidays.

uploads/questions/english/AL/28. Banks/2.transcription: There are tons of banks in Korea. They are everywhere these days. Many banks are on busy streets with a lot of foot traffic. They are concentrated near subway stations or large universities. There are ATMs outside where you can get cash. When you walk in, you can see tellers sitting at their desks. Normally, there is also a security guard on duty. Plus, there are screens that show the exchange rates for various currencies. So this is what the banks in Korea are like.

When I go to banks, I first pull out a number and wait for my turn. When they call my number, I go up to the teller and take care of my business. I most often check my balance or make wire transfers. I sometimes deposit or withdraw money. Plus, I sometimes open a new account. I sometimes open a savings account or a checking account. So these are things I do when I go to banks.

Frankly speaking, I do not remember how banks looked like when I was a kid. However, I do remember that I had to go to actual banks to do banking. But these days, I can do mobile banking whenever I want to. Banking has become a lot easier than in the past. It takes much less time and effort. To do mobile banking, I need several passwords. I make wire transfers most often through mobile banking. So I think mobile banking is one of the biggest changes that has happened to banks.

I remember going to the bank to pay a bill recently. However, there were so many people waiting at the bank. I first pulled out a number. However, there were 10 people waiting in front of me. I waited and waited, but it was still not my turn. I could not wait any longer, so I just had to leave the bank. It was very frustrating. Since then, I try to avoid busy hours at the bank.

uploads/questions/english/AL/29. Hotels/.transcription: There are tons of hotels in Korea. They are everywhere these days. Many hotels are on busy streets with a lot of foot traffic. They are concentrated near subway stations or large universities. Some hotels are very large in size. They have hundreds of guest rooms. They often have chains all across the world. Plus, there are many hotels at popular vacation spots. They get crowded during the peak season. They charge higher rates. So, this is what hotels in Korea are like.

I normally stay at hotels when I go on vacations. When I arrive at a hotel, I first go to the front desk to check in. I give them my name and my credit card. I get my room key and head to my room. When I get to my room, I first look around. Plus, I take a look at the view outside. After that, I unpack my things. And then I change into comfortable clothes. So these are the things I do when I arrive at a hotel.

I remember staying at a beachside hotel on my vacation. The hotel was very nice and pretty. When I arrived at the hotel, I first went to the front desk to check in. I gave them my name and my credit card. I got my room keys and headed to my room. When I got to my room, I first looked around. Plus, I took a look at the view outside. It was amazing. After that, I unpacked my things. And then I changed into comfortable clothes. So, this was the last time I stayed at a hotel.

I remember staying at a hotel resort several years ago. It was one of the best hotels there. The view from the room was amazing. I could see the sunrise and the sunset from the window. I ate at some restaurants in the hotel. The food tasted incredible. I also got a massage at the spa. I also went swimming in the swimming pool. Looking back, it was one of the most memorable hotels in my life. It was worth the money I spent.

uploads/questions/english/AL/30. Appoint.transcription: I make various types of appointments in my life. First, I make doctor appointments. I do that when I am sick. I also do that when I need to get some tests done. Also, I make dentist appointments. I do that when I have a toothache. I also do that when I need to get my teeth cleaned. Plus, I make hair appointments. I do that when I need to get my hair done. I sometimes get a haircut or get a perm. I sometimes get my hair dyed or get my roots done. So these are the appointments I make in my life.

When I have to make appointments, I first look for a phone number. Sometimes I have it on my phone. If not, I have to do a search online. It is quite easy to find phone numbers these days. And then I make a phone call to make an appointment. I ask them when they are available. I tell them when I want to come in and hang up. I usually get a text confirming my appointment. So this is what I do when I make appointments.

I remember making a hair appointment when I was a kid. I needed to get my hair done. I went to the hair salon on time. First, my hairstylist shampooed my hair. Next, she cut my hair. After that, she shampooed my hair again. And then, she dried and styled my hair. My hairstylist did a good job. I was happy with the new look.

I remember making a hair appointment recently. However, something came up suddenly. I could not make it to my appointment. I called the hair salon and told them that I could not go. Eventually, I made a new appointment and went another time.

What kinds of shirts are available? Can you tell me how much they are? Can you recommend anything? Is there a website I can see by any chance? I wonder if there are any promotions going on. It would be nice if I could get a good deal.

Hi there. I'm a person who got some clothes at your store. I'm afraid I left my new shirt behind at your store. It's a black t-shirt. Could you please check if you have my shirt? If so, I'll drop by to get it right away. Would that be possible? I'm sorry for all the trouble. Can you tell me when I can visit your store? What are your business hours? How late are you open? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.

I could not get the shoes I wanted. Plus, I remember getting a shirt online recently. I really liked it when I got it. However, when I tried it on at home, it did not fit me that well. It did not look good on me at all. Eventually, I sent it back to get a refund.

Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.

I wonder if I could get a refund if I want to. Would that be possible? I'm sorry for all the trouble. Can you tell me when I can visit your store? What are your business hours? How later are you open? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.

It did not look good on me at all. Eventually, I sent it back to get a refund.

Hi there. I'm a person who got a shirt at your store. I'm afraid there is a problem with the shirt. There is a rip on the right sleeve. I would like to come in to get an exchange. I wonder if I could get a refund if I want to. Would that be possible? I'm sorry for all the trouble. Can you tell me when I can visit your store? What are your business hours? How later are you open? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.
Frankly speaking, I've never had that kind of experience. I think I was lucky. So I really do not have much to say about this topic.

A few weeks ago, I bought a new phone online. However, the screen was cracked. Something must have happened during the delivery. I asked for an exchange right away. I had to wait another week to get another phone. It was very frustrating. So this was my experience of getting something damaged.

Hi there, Liz. This is Brian. I'm calling to ask about the new store. I would like to get some new clothes. What kinds of clothes are available? Can you tell me how much they are? Can you recommend anything? Is there a website I can see by any chance? I wonder if there are any promotions going on. It would be nice if I could get a good deal. Plus, can you give me directions to the store? I wonder if I could bring my car. If not, I'll just take public transportation. Is it close to the subway station? Is it within walking distance? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.

If so, I'll drop by to get it right away. Would that be possible? I'm sorry for all the trouble. Can you tell me when I can visit your store? What are your business hours? How later are you open? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.
I remember when I left my umbrella behind at a store. I completely forgot to pack it when I left the store. It was pouring outside, and I got a little wet. Since then, I try to be more careful.

Hi there. I'm calling to ask about package trips. I would like to go on a vacation. What kinds of package trips are available? Can you tell me how much they are? Can you recommend anything? Is there a website I can see by any chance? I wonder if there are any promotions going on. It would be nice if I could get a good deal. Plus, can you give me directions to your office? I wonder if I could bring my car. If not, I'll just take public transportation. Is it close to the subway station? Is it within walking distance? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.

Hi there, Jake. This is Brian. I have some bad news. I don't think I can make it to your place on time today. I just missed the train I had to take. Can you tell me what you want to do? Why don't you have dinner by yourself? How about we grab some drinks later on? Or maybe we could just have coffee. What do you say we just play it by ear? Can you tell me what you think? I'm fine with whatever you decide. Call me back when you get this. Thanks.
Frankly speaking, I have never had that kind of experience. I think I was lucky. So I really do not have much to say about this topic.

I have never had that kind of experience, but my friend was in trouble because of the cancelled flights. She booked a flight ticket to Europe last year. However, the airline was on strike, so her flight was cancelled. She had to find other ways to get there. Fortunately, she got another flight ticket, and she could enjoy her trip in Europe.

Hi there, Liz. This is Jake. I'm calling to ask about my trip. I would like to ask about your country's geography. First, are there any mountains there? If so, why don't we go hiking or camping? Plus, are there any beaches there? If so, how about we spend some time at the beach? Also, are there any lakes or rivers there? If so, maybe we could go on a picnic. Can you tell me what you think? I'm fine with whatever you decide. Call me back when you get this. Thanks.

Hi there, Liz. This is Jake. I have some bad news. I don't think I can make it to my trip. Something has come up suddenly. I would like to reschedule my trip. Can you help me make new arrangements? Would that be possible? I'm sorry for all the trouble. Can you tell me what you think? I'm fine with whatever you decide. Call me back when you get this. Thanks.

Japan is one of our closest neighboring countries. Japan is very similar to Korea when it comes to its geography. There are many mountains in Japan. In fact, roughly half of Japan is mountains. Also, Japan is an island nation, so there are tons of beaches. Some beaches are popular vacation spots. The coastline is very scenic. People often go on vacations to coastal areas. Once again, Japan is very similar to Korea when it comes to its geography.

Hi there, I'm calling to ask about renting a car. I would like to rent a car for a week. What kinds of cars are available? Can you tell me how much they are? Can you recommend anything? Is there a website I can see by any chance? I wonder if there are any promotions going on. It would be nice if I could get a good deal. Plus, can you give me directions to your office? Is it close to the subway station? Is it within walking distance? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.

Hi there. I'm a person who rented a car from your agency. I'm afraid there is a problem with the car. It is not cleaned up properly. It is also smaller than I thought. I am very unhappy with the car. I would like to come in to get an exchange. I wonder if I could get a refund if I want to. Would that be possible? I'm sorry for all the trouble. Can you tell me when I can visit your office? What are your business hours? How later are you open? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.
To be honest, I have never rented a car in my life, so I really do not have much to say about this topic.

When I visited Hawaii with my family, we decided to rent a car. It was the easiest way to move around in the island. We rented the car from Hertz because it was the nearest rental car agency from our hotel. The car was spacious and clean. We drove around the island for two days. It was very satisfying.

Hi there. I would like to rent a car. I would like to rent a car for a week. What kinds of cars are available? Can you tell me how much they are? Can you recommend anything? Is there a website I can see by any chance? I wonder if there are any promotions going on. It would be nice if I could get a good deal. Do you have any special rates?

Okay, let me tell you about my Korean driver's license. As you see, the title here says Driver's License. It is a Type 2 license, so I am allowed to drive sedans. The date here shows that it is still valid. It expires in 2022. So my driver's license is as good as a U.S. driver's license. I hope you can accept it.

Hi there. I'm a person who booked a package trip. However, I don't think I can make it to my trip. Something has come up suddenly. I would like to reschedule my trip. If not, do you have a door that's not locked? Or do you have a window that's not locked? If so, maybe I could climb through the window. Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.

I remember when I was supposed to have a gathering with my friends. However, I got sick because I drank a lot the night before. I had a bad hangover. My stomach was upset and I felt dizzy. So, these are the problems I have had with my card.

To stay healthy, I tried to work out whenever I could. I tried to get some exercise at the gym. I tried to go for runs at the park. Plus, I tried to eat well and properly. That way, I was able to get less stress. So, these are the changes I have made to my lifestyle to stay healthy.

Eating healthy was one of the most effective ways to stay healthy. I tried to eat vegetables and fruits as often as I could. They contain a lot of vitamins and fiber. So, eating healthy helped me stay healthy and lose some weight.

I'm free on Saturday. Are you available that day? If not, I can make some time on Sunday. Tell me when the best time is for you. Next, can you tell me what you want to do? Why don't we go on a picnic? How about we make some sandwiches? Or maybe we could eat at a decent place near the park. What do you say we do a search before we go? Give me a call when you get this. Thanks.

uploads/questions/english/IH/01. Newspap.transcription: People do tons of things on the internet these days. First, they send email or check messages. Also, they post things on social media quite often. Plus, they play online games or watch video clips. Also, they shop online or do online banking. So these are the things people do on the internet.

I do various types of things online these days. I usually use my smartphone to get access to the internet, so I can surf the internet whenever I want to. First, I do online searches or read news articles. Also, I chat with people on messaging apps. Next, I stream music or watch movies. Plus, I check the weather forecast. Also, I leave comments on people's postings. So, these are the things I do on the internet.

Back in the day, internet connection was quite slow. It took me a long time to log on to websites. Plus, I used to get access to the internet on my computer. But now, the internet has become a lot faster than in the past. It takes much less time to log on to websites. Also, I can surf the internet on my smartphone now. I can get access to the internet on the go. So internet surfing has become a lot easier thanks to smartphones.

I remember doing a project at work recently. I had to write a report for the project. I surfed the internet and did some searches. I gathered some data and used them in my report. The report became better because there was a lot of information in it. It was worth the time and energy. So surfing the internet was very helpful when I was doing my project.

I remember seeing some posting about the recent Me Too movement. Sexual violence has become a major issue. Some people commit sexual harassment or rape. More recently, sex crime victims have been raising their voices. They are sharing their stories on the media. People are supporting the victims and criticizing the sex offenders. This is called the Me Too movement. I strongly believe that sex crimes should be wiped out completely.

Online security has become a major concern among people. Personal information is being leaked quite often. The recent Facebook incident is a good example. The usage history of tens of millions of users was misused. Plus, there are huge hacking incidents from time to time. Online systems get attacked by hackers, which cause a lot of damage. Once again, online security has become a major concern among people.

The younger generation are very tech-savvy. They are very active and creative on the internet. Plus, they get access to the internet on their smartphones more often. They do everything on the go. On the other hand, the older generation are less tech-savvy. They are less active on the internet. Plus, they surf the internet on their computers more often. So, these are the differences between people in different age groups.

uploads/questions/english/IH/02. Televis.transcription: People do tons of things on their smartphones these days. First, they send email or check messages. Also, they post things on social media quite often. Plus, they play online games or watch video clips. Also, they shop online or do online banking. So these are the things people do on their smartphones.

I use my cell phone every single day. I usually use my smartphone to get access to the internet, so I can surf the internet whenever I want to. First, I chat with people on messaging apps. Also, I do online searches or read news articles. Next, I stream music or watch movies. Plus, I check the weather forecast. Also, I leave comments on people's postings. So these are the things I do on my phone.
Other than making phone calls, I listen to music on my phone. I can listen to music on the go. I do that on the subway or the bus. So, I listen to music on my phone whenever I want to.

My first cell phone was a simple phone. I was able to just make phone calls and send text messages, but that was it. However, phones have changed a lot over the years. They have become a lot better than in the past. I can do a lot more on my phone now. I can get access to the internet whenever I want to. So smartphones have made a big difference in our lives.

I use my phone throughout the day, so it runs out of battery quite often. Once, my phone died when I was outside. It was very inconvenient because my phone was dead. I had to call someone, but I could not. I had to check some messages, but I could not. Eventually, I checked my phone after I got home. Since then, I always carry around my charger.

Cell phones five years ago were smartphones. However, the internet connection was quite slow. People did online searches on their phones, but that was it. But these days, mobile internet has become a lot faster. Plus, you can get Wi-Fi connection at many places. People do tons of things on their phones now. They stream music and watch video clips. Plus, they play online games and take online classes. So people use their phones to do various types of things these days.

Many youngsters spend too much time on their phones. They always have their phones in their hands. They constantly chat on messaging apps. They constantly post things or comments on social media. It is hard for them to develop face-to-face communication skills. Many people are concerned about this problem. So phone addiction has become a major issue among youngsters.

uploads/questions/english/IH/03. Interne.transcription: I use a messaging app called Kakao Talk to talk to my friends. I talk about tons of things with my friends on that app. First, we ask how each other is doing and do some catching up. I also share pictures, video clips, and links with my friends. Once again, I talk about tons of things with my friends on Kakao Talk.

I talk to various types of people on my messaging app. I message my family members, friends, or coworkers. I use my phone to message people on the go. I do that when I am on the bus or the subway. Plus, I do that when I am walking on the street. Also, I message people when I am indoors. I do that when I am sitting at my desk. Next, I do that when lying in my bed. So I can send messages on my phone whenever I want to.

I remember getting a lot of birthday messages on my last birthday. Many of my friends remembered that it was my birthday. They congratulated me and told me to have a great birthday. Some of them sent me gift vouchers as a present. It felt good to get so many caring messages from people. I replied to each message and thanked them.

I remember having trouble sending a message because the internet connection was bad. I tried and tried, but I could not send the message. It was so frustrating. Next, I remember sending a message to the wrong chat room. It was a personal message, but I sent it to a work-related chat room. I apologized for my mistake. It was so embarrassing. So these are the problems I have had with messages.

uploads/questions/english/IH/04. Phones.transcription: There are tons of stores in Korea. They are everywhere these days. Many stores are on busy streets with a lot of foot traffic. One of the largest places to shop is outlet malls. There are various types of stores at these places. You can get discounts, so you can get great deals there. Plus, there are many restaurants at outlet malls. So you can grab a bite if you are hungry. Once again, there are tons of stores in Korea.

When I was a kid, fashion styles were not that stylish. But now, there are tons of online shopping malls. People get exposed to new fashion trends much more easily. They have become a lot more fashionable than in the past. So, that's the difference between fashion trends in the past and now.

I remember shopping for some shoes recently. There were a pair of running shoes I wanted to get. However, the store did not have my size in stock. They were sold out. I could not get the shoes I wanted. Plus, I remember getting a shirt online. I tried it on at home, but it did not fit me. I sent it back to get a refund.

I go to various places to shop, such as outlet malls or department stores. However, I also like to shop online. Online shopping is very convenient in many ways. It takes much less time and energy to buy things. Shopping has become a lot easier than in the past. Also, there are a lot of options to choose from, so I can get great deals. I buy things such as electronics or tickets on the internet most often. Once again, I like to shop online quite often.

I remember getting groceries with my family when I was a kid. We went to a local supermarket near our house. They had good prices and good quality goods, so we were able to get great deals there. We used to get some ice cream, milk, and cheese. I was very excited whenever I went there. So this was my early memory of shopping.

I remember getting groceries with my family recently. We went to a local supermarket near our house. They had good prices and good quality goods. So we were able to get great deals there. First, we got some rice, meat, and bread. So this was the last time I went shopping for something.

I remember shopping for some shoes recently. There were a pair of running shoes I wanted to get. However, the store did not have my size in stock. They were sold out. I could not get the shoes I wanted. Plus, I remember getting a shirt online. I tried it on at home, but it did not fit me. I sent it back to get a refund.

In the past, people went to actual stores to buy things. But these days, people shop online very often as well. Online shopping is very convenient in many ways. It takes much less time and energy to buy things. Also, there are a lot of options to choose from, so people can get great deals. So shopping has become a lot easier than in the past.

People are very interested in Bluetooth devices these days. They listen to music on their cell phones. Cell phones have Bluetooth functions. So you can connect them to various types of devices. There are tons of Bluetooth earphones or Bluetooth speakers. They are very convenient because you do not need any wires. Once again, Bluetooth devices are one of the hottest devices these days.

I think Koreans are very stylish. They like to follow the latest fashion trends. Korea has four distinct seasons. Spring, fall, summer, and winter. People wear different clothes for each season. So fashion styles are seasonal. Once again, I think Koreans are very fashionable.
I like to follow my own style. I just wear things that look good on me. I usually like to dress casually. However, I pay attention to detail when I dress up.

uploads/questions/english/IH/05. Music/0.transcription: I live in an apartment with my family. I have lived there for three years. There are three bedrooms, a living room, and a kitchen. Plus, there are two bathrooms and two balconies. In the living room, there are some furniture and home appliances. First, there is a sofa, a tea table, a cabinet, and a mirror. Also, there is a TV, an AC, and an air purifier. The living room is connected to the kitchen. In the kitchen, there is a sink, a dining table, and some cabinets. Plus, there is a fridge, a microwave, and a gas stove. Also, there is a water cooler, a rice cooker, and a coffee machine. So this is what my place looks like.

I think my favorite room at home is my bedroom. In my bedroom, I have a desk, a chair, a computer, and a dressing table. Plus, I have a bookshelf, a bed, a nightstand, and some dressers and closets. My room is the best place to kick back and relax. I can get some rest when I get home. Plus, I can do whatever I want to in my room. I can surf the internet, listen to music, or get some sleep. Also, I can watch TV, read books, or watch movies. So this is what my favorite room looks like.

I try to clean my apartment whenever I can. First, I vacuum and mop the floors, and dust the furniture. Plus, I clean the bathroom after I take showers. Next, I do the dishes after I have meals. Also, I take out the garbage and do the recycling. On weekends, I do the laundry. First, I throw my laundry in the washer. And then, I wash my clothes. After that, I hang dry the laundry on the rack. When they dry, I fold the clothes and put them in the dressers. So these are the housework I do at home.

I remember living in an apartment when I was a kid. There used to be a playground near my apartment. I used to play there all the time with my friends. I have many great memories of that place. But now, I live in a more spacious apartment. There is a park in the neighborhood where I can take walks. I can get some exercise there. Plus, there is a post office, a police station, a bank, and a bakery. Also, there is a subway station, a bus stop, a gym, and a library. Next, there is a convenience store, a coffee shop, and a dry cleaners. So, this is what my neighborhood looks like.

I remember having my mom's birthday party at home. It was her 68th birthday. We got a birthday cake and gifts for my mom. Also, we cooked some food for the party. Plus, we ordered in some Chinese food. The food tasted so good because I was starving. After the party, there were some leftovers. I helped clean up after the party. It was a very enjoyable party.

I remember redoing the wallpaper at my apartment. After it was done, the walls looked brand new. I was very happy with the new look. Plus, I remember getting some new furniture. I got a new bed, a new table, and a new bookshelf. And then, I rearranged the furniture. So, these are the changes I remember.

I remember when the AC broke down at home. It was during summer and it was very hot without air conditioning. I called a technician to fix the problem. Plus, I remember when the remote control for the TV did not work well. I had to replace the batteries for the remote. Also, I remember when water leaked from the fridge. I had to wipe the water from the floor. Plus, I remember breaking a plate by mistake. So these are the problems I remember having at home.

As I mentioned, I remember breaking a plate at home. I dropped the plate by accident because it was slippery. I lost my grip. The plate broke into several pieces. I had to clean up the glass. I picked up the big pieces and vacuumed the small pieces. I tried to be careful, but I cut my hand on a piece of glass. It was bleeding and it was a little sore. Since then, I try to be more careful.

uploads/questions/english/IH/06. Movies/.transcription: To be honest, my parents and I do not solve problems at home differently. First, we deal with small problems ourselves. For example, when we break glass by mistake, we clean up the glass. We pick up the big pieces and vacuum the small pieces. On the other hand, we get help for bigger problems. For instance, when home appliances break down, we get some help. We call a technician to fix the problem. Once again, we do not solve problems at home differently.

Homes have changed a lot over the last five to ten years. For example, apartments have become a lot prettier over the years. They look very modern and well-designed. Plus, apartments have become a lot taller than in the past. People have a better view from their homes. So, homes have become a lot better than in the past.

I recently watched the news about the housing market. Rent prices have risen a lot in Korea recently. People have a lot of trouble paying the rent. Some people get a loan to pay the rent. Some people move to smaller homes to lower the rent. Once again, one of the biggest problems in the housing market is high rent prices.

I have various types of new home appliances in my apartment. One of the most important appliances is the fridge. It keeps food cold and prevents it from going bad. Next, the microwave heats food up. It has made our lives a lot easier. Also, the air purifier makes the air clean. It is a must-have item because the air quality is pretty bad these days. So these are the new appliances I have at home.

I think vacuum cleaners are one of the most useful home appliances. Back in the day, we used to sweep the floors with a broom, but now we use vacuum cleaners to clean the floors. They suck up the dust very easily. Plus, there are wireless vacuum cleaners these days. They are even more convenient because you do not need to plug them in. So, cleaning the floors has become a lot easier than in the past.

uploads/questions/english/IH/07. Industr.transcription: There are various types of furniture in my apartment. In the living room, there is a sofa, a tea table, and a cabinet. In my bedroom, I have a bed, a desk, a chair, and a nightstand. Plus, I have a bookshelf, a dressing table, and some closets. I think my favorite furniture is my bed, because I love to sleep. It is a very comfy and cozy bed, so these are the types of furniture I have at home.

I use the sofa in the living room all the time. I sit on it when I'm getting some rest or watching TV. I sometimes lie down on it to take a nap. I use my bed in my room every single day. Getting a good night's sleep is very important. Having a good mattress helps me get quality sleep.

When I was a kid, the furniture I had was a lot smaller. For example, my bed was a single bed for children. The one I use now is a queen-sized bed for adults. Next, the color of the furniture used to be brighter. For instance, my bookshelf was light brown when I was a kid. The one I use now is dark brown. So, the size and color of the furniture are the biggest differences.

I remember when one of the chairs at home got damaged. One of the legs broke off. Plus, one of the handles fell off. Also, there were scratches on the side. It was impossible to fix it, so we threw it away. So this was the problem I had with furniture.

When I was a kid, people did not recycle at their homes. Instead, there used to be recycling days at schools. Students used to take scrap paper to school on those days. But these days, recycling is very well practiced at people's homes. It has become a daily routine in people's lives.

uploads/questions/english/IH/22. Fashion.transcription: Korea has four distinct seasons. Spring, summer, fall, and winter. The weather is very nice in spring and fall. The temperatures are very mild. It is great for outdoor activities. On the other hand, summer is extremely hot. It is very humid and sticky. We have the rainy season in summer, and it pours. Winter is the complete opposite. It is freezing cold, and we get a lot of snow in

It is late fall here in Korea right now. It is very sunny today and we have clear skies. The weather is getting colder and colder every day. Soon it will be early winter. The weather forecast says it's going to rain tomorrow.

We still have four distinct seasons in Korea. However, spring and fall have become shorter. On the other hand, summer and winter have become longer. Plus, it seems to rain a lot more in summer. So spring and fall have become shorter, while summer and winter have become longer.

I remember when a strong typhoon hit Korea this year. There were strong winds and heavy rainfalls. There were floods all over the place. Many houses and cars went underwater. It was very nerve-wracking. It took a long time to recover from the damage.

Plus, some people drive their own cars. However, traffic gets very bad sometimes. Parking can be a problem as well. So, people use public transportation or drive their own cars to get around.

I personally take the subway most often. It is very convenient because I can go wherever I want to. It is one of the cheapest ways to get around. Plus, I sometimes drive my own car. I got my driver's license in 2002. So, I mostly use public transportation to get around.

When I was a kid, trains used to be slower. But now, Korea has bullet trains called the KTX and SRT. Trains have become much faster than in the past. Plus, when I was a kid, plane tickets used to be very expensive. But now, plane tickets have become much cheaper thanks to low-cost carriers. Next, when I was a kid, people used to use paper maps. I remember when I was stuck in traffic for a long time. It was during the holidays. I was heading to my grandparents' place. It took me much longer than usual. It took almost four hours to get to my destination. Since then, I always head out early during the holidays.

Here is why this happened. China used to import recyclables from other countries. However, it stopped doing that for environmental reasons. The prices for scrap plastic plunged, so no one would collect them. So this was the news I watched about recycling recently.
